short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 8x8 UC Agent drives productivity by enabling voice calls, meetings and Click To Dial in Microsoft Teams

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
8x8's out-of-the-box integration with Microsoft Teams allows click to call a Microsoft Team member.

An 8x8 dialer allows to receive and make calls.

Key Benefits:
Increased Productivity
8x8 dialer functionality
